content.raw: I think if we just rename the macros to have an `ign_` or `IGN_` prefix, and get rid of `ign_import_target` (since we can just use the targets that get imported by `OptiX_add_imported_library(~)`), I'll be happy to approve this PR. I would also recommend changing the target names a little bit, but that's not important.
content.html: I think if we just rename the macros to have an ign_ or IGN_ prefix, and get rid of ign_import_target (since we can just use the targets that get imported by OptiX_add_imported_library(~)), I'll be happy to approve this PR. I would also recommend changing the target names a little bit, but that's not important.
